name: ts-for-gir-gtk-4-list-store-example
description: It takes the hassle away from building Gtk4 application in Python So you can create a cool application, without all the boilerplate code

scripts.build:types: yarn ts-for-gir generate Gtk-4.0 -e gjs --useNamespace -t esm
scripts.build: yarn run build:types && yarn run build:app
scripts.start: yarn run build && yarn run start:app
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:types && yarn run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
